name: sitefox
description: Backend web framework for Node + ClojureScript
author: Chris McCormick <chis@mccormick.cx>

scripts.pre-publish: npm run sync-deps; nbb bin/update-readme-versions.cljs; npm run docs; echo 'Now commit changes and run `git tag vX.Y.Z`.'
scripts.test: rm -f tests.sqlite; shadow-cljs compile test && SECRET=x TESTING=1 DATABASE_URL=sqlite://./tests.sqlite node tests.js
